title: Co-Creation-Based Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) Teacher Development Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Prior experience in foundational pedagogy and digital tool utilization is advantageous
context.additional_context: For pre-service teachers or education majors, emphasizing TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) design competencies applicable to real classroom settings

learning_goals: Learners can utilize technology-based instructional design frameworks through collaborative design processes.
Learners can collaborate with various educational stakeholders to develop TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning) materials and activity plans centered on mathematics curricula.
Learners can make pedagogically contextualized decisions when introducing technology by applying the Knowledge Appropriation Model.

resources: Digital Tools for Mathematics Education (e.g., GeoGebra)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
